query: SELECT * FROM checklist_items WHERE tripId = 30001 LIMIT 20;
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute SELECT * FROM checklist_items WHERE tripId = 30001 LIMIT 20;

rows.title: Check passport validity (6+ months)
rows.notes: Passports must be valid for at least 6 months beyond travel dates

rows.title: Print flight confirmations
rows.notes: Print all flight tickets and boarding passes

rows.title: Print hotel confirmations
rows.notes: Print all hotel booking confirmations

rows.title: Travel insurance documents
rows.notes: Print travel insurance policy and emergency contact numbers

rows.title: Car rental confirmation
rows.notes: Print car rental voucher and terms

rows.title: International driving permit
rows.notes: Get international driving permit if required

rows.title: Confirm Figlmüller restaurant reservation
rows.notes: Book table at Figlmüller in Vienna (Day 7)

rows.title: Confirm Villa Regia restaurant reservation
rows.notes: Book table at Villa Regia in Košice (Day 6)

rows.title: Comfortable walking shoes
rows.notes: Essential for city tours and hiking

rows.title: Weather-appropriate clothing
rows.notes: Check September weather in Slovakia/Austria

rows.title: Rain jacket/umbrella
rows.notes: September can be rainy

rows.title: Hiking gear for mountain trips
rows.notes: For Štrbské Pleso and Jasná trips

rows.title: Phone chargers and adapters
rows.notes: EU plug adapters (Type C/F)

rows.title: Camera and memory cards
rows.notes: For capturing memories

rows.title: Reusable water bottles
rows.notes: Stay hydrated during tours

rows.title: Pack prescription medications
rows.notes: Bring enough for entire trip plus extra days

rows.title: Basic first aid kit
rows.notes: Band-aids, pain relievers, anti-diarrhea meds

rows.title: Check EHIC/travel health insurance
rows.notes: European Health Insurance Card or equivalent

rows.title: Notify bank of travel dates
rows.notes: Prevent card blocks due to foreign transactions

rows.title: Get some Euros cash
rows.notes: Small amounts for tips and small purchases
